item.title: About
item.description: I’m a polyglot full stack programmer. I’m a citizen of Michgan where I live with my beautiful wife and son. Languages I’m comfortable working in: * Go * JavaScript * PHP * HTML/CSS * Bash Text editors: * Vim * VS Code
